author: sagarbansal21
content: According to Dapp Radar, cryptocurrency is on course to have its first month with sales under $1 billion since June 2021. According to Dune, sales at OpenSea, the top NFT marketplace, have dropped by 75% since May and are on pace to reach their lowest levels since July 2021. Of course, OpenSea continues to be the largest and conducts deals worth over $14 billion.We look to NFT initiatives that have long-term utility throughout this recession. Directors like David Kronenberg and Julie Pacino have utilised NFT sales over the past 12 months to advertise and finance their forthcoming movies. While Mogul Productions (CRYPTO: STARS) is doing things on a different scale: creating a platform aimed at helping independent filmmakers find their voice and create their content with the fundraising support of Mogul's platform, which serves as a launchpad for outstanding projects.While IDO launchpads like AdLunam, which uses an Engage to Earn model for users and is one of many funds that lets community members vote on which projects to fund can help Mogul building outstanding movies.Learn more: https://adlunam.cc
